info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 20 at 6:10AM EDT until April 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Portions of Virginia and North Carolina from the Blue Ridge to the Piedmont, including Roanoke, Lynchburg, Danville, Appomattox, Buckingham, Halifax, South Boston, Martinsville, Mount Airy, Eden, Reidsville, Yadkinville and Yanceyville. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will climb above freezing after 9 AM. After that time, remove any coverings which were placed over plants.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
